texts: Wow. What a night, huh? I've got a nasty headache.

options.label: It was a night to remember.

texts: Guess we'd better start cleaning up the place. Hey, can you do me a favor?
There's a guy outside the house. I think I gave him my Amulet last night, but I want it back now. Can you go get it?
I don't know, man. Some people can't take a hint. I'd go out myself but it's WAY too bright outside, ya know?
This is why we're friends. You're the best.
Don't tell anyone I told you, but you can press E while facing something to interact with it. Like the door.
Thank you so much for helping me!
Wow, I thought I'd never get it back!
Thank you so much. This amulet is a family heirloom.
You're the best!
I'm so glad you didn't get killed out there looking for those artifacts.
I hope you didn't have to go into those awful crypts for this thing. I appreciate it.
Got my amulet?
Hey!
Don't worry, I'll get this cleaned up soon.
Did you get the amulet?
I sure do miss that amulet.
What a night.
Man, I can't believe I gave that guy my amulet. What a con artist!
This place is a dump.
I'd rather move than clean this dump.
Did you know there are hidden underground rooms near our house? Spooky.
Why don't we have any furniture?
I think we should buy a bed at some point.
It's me, your best friend.
If I close my eyes I can pretend we live in a nicer neighborhood.
One day I might enroll at that magic school up north. You should come with me.
Controls? Controls to what? Why are you talking like that?
Keep your voice down! If the Omniscient One catches me breaking the immersion, I'll be replaced. I'll tell you if you promise to keep it to yourself.
Press TAB to open your Journal, WASD to move, CTRL to strafe, Left Mouse to cast and E to interact. ESCAPE will back out of most menus or pause.
You'd better. You don't know who I'm dealing with.

options.label: This sounds like a conversation for another time.

texts: Furniture costs money.
There's not a lot around here except campsites and cemeteries, for some reason. Also that creepy guy outside.
I wish. He just kinda showed up at the party last night, and we were all too drunk to care.
Yea. I'm hoping he leaves soon. OH, before I forget, there's a Wishing Well north of here. All you gotta do is drop some money in and all your wildest dreams will come true.
I thought so, until it jammed or something and ate all my coins! Stupid thing hates me.
It's straightforward, but pay attention to the details. Press TAB to open your Journal, then press the + button in the corner.
You'll see a list of Magic Techniques that you can combine to create custom spells. Each one changes a specific behaviour or property of the spell.
You probably don't have many right now to choose from, but as you explore the world, you'll discover more, and your spells will become more powerful and complex.
To create a spell, you'll need Magic Crystals. They're found in dungeons. To cast a spell, you'll need to have enough Mana. Mana regenerates over time.
Be careful when combining Techniques. Sometimes they conflict with each other. The more that conflict, the more volatile your spell will become.
When spells become unstable, they do unpredictable things. Sometimes they misfire. Sometimes they blow up in your face. So be careful out there!
No problem. Also, I'm pretty sure the guy outside sells pre-made Spells if you need one in a pinch.
You know, I don't think we've met.
I don't think we've met.
I don't remember seeing you last night. Have we met?
How's the hangover?
Not much for small talk, huh? Look, we made a bet last night and he lost. Fair and square.
Well, unlike your friend, I'm a man of my word, and I don't give up easy. But I'll cut you a deal. If you help me with my...problem...I'll give you the amulet back.
I'm a collector of sorts, and I've been looking for Strange Artifacts scattered around the world. But it's getting harder and harder to find them these days.
None of your business, errand boy! Are you in or not?

options.label: I guess I don't have a choice.

texts: Not if you want that amulet back. I'd start by exploring the dungeons nearby. The farther you travel, the more dangerous they get.
One more thing. You'll probably need a Healing spell. Take this one, on the house. But the next one will cost ya.
If you need more information, talk to your friend. I've got places to be.
Now get going! Time is of the essence. The survival of my project depends on those artifacts!
Got something for me?
Did you find my artifacts?
How's the hunt?
I see you're still alive. That's a good sign.
How's it going?
Still looking?
I'm hoping to get those artifacts by sundown.
What are you here for?
Buying or selling?
Doing a little shopping, are we?
I've got exactly what you need.
I've got the best prices in all the land.
What do you need?
What are you looking for?
Make it quick. I'm a busy man.
What kind of Spell are you looking for?
Got a specific one in mind?
If I don't have it, it doesn't exist. It's not true in the slightest, but it's catchy.
I'll take your money, but you know you can craft your own spells, right?
Let's see what you've got.
This better be good...
Let's take a peek inside that bag of yours.
Impress me.
I hope you're not wasting my time.
Help!
Somebody help me!
Hey you!
Please help!
Are you one of them?
Please don't hurt me.
Hi!
What do you want?
Hello.
Nice weather we're having.
Going into that dungeon?
You look like an explorer.
Oh, hi there!
I've heard there are horrible monsters in those crypts.
Ever been down those trapdoors? I'm too scared to go, myself.
Are you an explorer? Have you ever seen a dungeon?
I'm just a lowly Civilian, with no goals or aspirations. I don't even have a name. How cruel!
Oh, thank the Omniscience you're here!
Uh, never mind.
Forget I said anything.
You don't know? Uh, forget it, then.
I need to get out of here! Can you take me with you? I'll pay you.
You won't regret this.
I don't know what I'd do without you.
Great!
You're my hero!
My hero!
Whew! I thought I was a goner!
I can't wait to see my family again.
My knight in shining armor!
The faster I'm out of here, the better.
Hope I don't die on the way! Haha! Ha!
Are you kidding me?
Oh, come on!
Wow. Some people really are heartless.
I'm going to die down here.
I'll never see my family again!
Jerk!
You'll RUE this day!
You'll die down here, just like me.
Fine! Have it your way.
We'll see how the Omniscience takes this!
I'll follow you. Take me to the exit and you'll get your reward.
Still here.
Right behind you.
Let's just hurry.
Thanks again for helping me.
Are we close?
Are we there yet?
Yea?
What is it?
We need to get out of here.
Don't leave me behind.
I hope you aren't leading me to my death.
If I die, tell my wife I love her.
Please don't be too long!
Whew, I was getting tired.
I won't move a muscle, trust me.
Don't forget me down here!
Good plan, I'll wait here until it's cleared.
I hope you've got a plan.
Not again!
You monster!
You'll get yours one day. Mark my words!
How could you betray me like this?
What!? I can't survive on my own!
Let's get out of here!
I thought you'd never come back!
You came back!
I think I heard a rat
Oh, you came back, did you?
You...came back for me?
Do my eyes deceive me?
What? Why did you come back?
I can't believe it, you're back?
We did it!
We made it!
That was a close one!
At last, sunlight!
I thought we'd never make it.
Oh, sweet daylight.
It's a miracle!
You've saved my life. Here's your payment. Thank you so much!
Thanks again for helping me! I don't know what I'd do without you.
If it weren't for you, I'd be dead down there.
You saved my life. I am forever grateful.
Boy, we had some rough times down there, huh? Thanks again.
Speak your wish.
What do you desire?
What brings you to me on this day?
Tell me what it is you seek.
What is it that you seek?

options.label: Did you take my roommate's money?

texts: Oh, my aching head.
Very funny.
I wish for you to leave.
You think you're so funny, don't you?
Your friend has his own version of the truth. I am fair and impartial.

options.label: I'm not going to get involved.

texts: Excellent choice! 100 Gold for +10 Max Mana.
Excellent choice! 250 Gold for +10 Max Health.
